channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FBI Alert Issued As Time Traveling Hackers Attack — Act Now
item.description: What if hackers could time travel? That’s the eyebrow-raising reality of this latest attack, and the FBI wants you to act today.

item.title: From ChatGPT To Agent Networks: Why Your Company Needs A Multi-AI Strategy
item.description: This article explains why integrating multiple AI models is crucial for businesses to remain competitive in the age of AI innovation.

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Comedy Has 2025’s Best Critic Scores
item.description: The best new movie to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with near perfect scores from critics, and it really is for everyone to enjoy.

item.title: Mission First: Pharma Should Partner, Not Build, Their AI Solutions
item.description: In pharma, buying software (instead of building) means working with industry professionals who can develop solutions to meet their needs—even before t...

item.title: Rebuilding Trust In A Remote Work Era: The Intersection Of Technology And Authentic Leadership
item.description: Rebuilding trust in remote work demands a balance between technological innovation and authentic leadership.

item.title: Division is easier than connection
item.description: But connection is where the value lies. Connected, resilient communities create possibility and forward motion. Division is satisfying in the short ru...

item.title: “Be yourself”

item.title: Toward leggiero
item.description: We might not seek it out often enough in our work. It’s a musical term, but we can use it too. The light touch. A way to make a sound without making a...

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.

item.title: The name doesn’t matter (that much)
